module.sqlWrap: delete from CircleRanking insert into CircleRanking(CircleId,Ranking,Number) select CircleId,Ranking,Number from ( select CircleId, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Number DESC) AS Ranking, Number from (select Count(*) as Number , CircleId from [FollowedCircle] group by [CircleId]) tab1 ) tab2 order by CircleId
